entries.title: Help URL
entries.description: URL to the manual. If empty, it links to the latest manual from BEXIS2

entries.title: Former Member Role/Group
entries.description: The role/group that is assigned to a user when he/she is no longer a member of the project.

entries.title: Former Member Mail: Title
entries.description: Alternative subject for mails. If empty per default the instance short name as for all system mails as well.

entries.title: Former Member Mail: Main Text (applied)
entries.value: This implies that your access to some features in BEXIS2 will be restricted. You have full access to your datasets and publications.
entries.description: Main text for former members mails (applied).

entries.title: Former Member Mail: Main Text (revoked)
entries.value: This implies that your previous access rights to features and datasets in BEXIS2 have been re-applied.
entries.description: Main text for former members mails (revoked).
